summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 10 October to end of Monday 11 October GMT
description: The weekend weather is forecast to be dry with sunny periods.<br/><br/>The easterly air flow is expected to become more north westerly as a high pressure area moves over the Atlantic Ocean.<br/><br/>With little pollution import and adequate dispersion of local emmisions, overall air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
